label: Output directory
help: Path where your sets will be created (original sets will be left untouched)

label: Fba_libretro set folder
help: Path to your fba_libretro set, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Mame2010 set folder
help: Path to your mame2010 set, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Mame2003 set folder
help: Path to your mame2003 set, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Images folder
help: Paths to your images set, leave empty if you do not have it.

label: Dry run
help: Set this to 1 to generate only dat and CSV files, no roms will be copied

label: Keep level
help: Roms with working state superior or equals to keepLevel will be kept

label: Keep not tested roms
help: Untested roms will be kept even in STRICT mode

label: Exclusion Type
help: Determine how roms are kept if they are in different sets

label: Prefered set
help: General prefered set in STRICT mode if rom is in same working level in several sets.

label: Use prefered set for genre
help: Use prefered set for genres in STRICT mode and define them. Takes precedence over general prefered set if activated

label: Your output dir is {outputDir}\nIts content will be erased.\nIf you don't want to proceed, close this window, or click Cancel
